name: UAC Bypass Using NTFS Reparse Point - File
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using NTFS reparse point and wusa.exe DLL hijacking (UACMe 36)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:C\:\\Users\\* AND file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\api\-ms\-win\-core\-kernel32\-legacy\-l1.DLL)`
